alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Hamilton; Henry; Madison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:25PM EDT until June 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Madison County in central Indiana... Southwestern Delaware County in east central Indiana... Northwestern Henry County in east central Indiana... Northeastern Hamilton County in central Indiana... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Anderson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Edgewood and River Forest around 430 PM EDT. Alexandria, Country Club Heights and Woodlawn Heights around 435 PM EDT. Anderson and Chesterfield around 440 PM EDT. Daleville around 445 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Yorktown and Muncie. This includes Interstate 69 between mile markers 223 and 242. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and east central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
